chapters.title: Chapter 17: Heading West
chapters.info: Cerandin, p. 330 (234)—A woman who tends boar-horses (that is, elephants) for Valan Luca's menagerie. She calls the animals s'redit. She is allegedly from Shara, where the animals came from, but in reality she and the animals were left behind when the Seanchan fled Falme.
